titles.title: Expanding Access to Low-Cost Generics Act of 2019
Expanding Access to Low-Cost Generics Act of 2019
Expanding Access to Low-Cost Generics Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the 180-day exclusivity period, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
